game.name: Penguin Quest
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: You’re a perky penguin who must find a suitable new place to live as your current surroundings are over-crowded. You’ve heard news of another flock just over the horizon, but it’s cold out there so watch out that you don’t freeze!
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re a perky penguin who must find a suitable new place to live as your current surroundings are over-crowded. You’ve heard news of another flock just over the horizon, but it’s cold out there so watch out that you don’t freeze!
